title: Ep. 305: De-Puffing and Chilling (Our Faces) with Lauryn Evarts Bosstick
itunes:title: Ep. 305: De-Puffing and Chilling (Our Faces) with Lauryn Evarts Bosstick
itunes:subtitle: Learn more about cold therapy and ice facials with podcaster, blogger, and The Skinny Confidential founder Lauryn Evarts Bosstick. We also discuss her face-rolling technique; why she prefers icy showers and breathing exercises to meditation; the skinca...
description:
Learn more about cold therapy and ice facials with podcaster, blogger, and The Skinny Confidential founder Lauryn Evarts Bosstick. We also discuss her face-rolling technique; why she prefers icy showers and breathing exercises to meditation; the skincare products she can’t live without; her favorite podcast guests; and the best tips from her upcoming book, Get The F*ck Out Of The Sun. -- For a list of products featured in this episode: myshlf.us/fatmascara; Episode recap: fatmascara.com/blog; Our private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To submit a "Raise A Wand" product recommendation & be featured on a future episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
